name: What a Catch! (Demo)
description:
What a Catch! is a Dating Simulation Visual Novel game created by Elise Foley, the demo is her thesis project at Maine College of Art. 

Reel in some hotties straight from the ocean (fresh, never frozen)-- or will you find yourself tangled in one of their lines instead? Meet your sea-mate among six colorful merfolk, covering many shapes, sizes, genders and species, each lovable in their own way.

*(Content Warnings: blood, death, terminal illness, violence, (debatable)horror elements(?) )

This is a demo version with one playable route. The full game, which will include 6 routes, is currently in progress! Check back for more updates! 

PC and Mac downloads available
